channel.title: Make it so a player can't kill the same player over? [EDIT: STILL NEED HELP!]
channel.description: There has been some pkp boosting in my server lately, and want I to stop it. How would I make it so the person pkp boosting cant kill the same player, over and over?

item.title: Make it so a player can't kill the same player over? [EDIT: STILL NEED HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:4, topic:446724”]I’m not going to spoon feed you but.

[code=java]
final List killedPlayers = new ArrayList();

void playerKilled() {
killedPlayers.add(player);
}

void attackPlayer() {
if (killedPlayers.contains(player)) {
return;
}
}
[/code][/quote]
EDIT:

DIDNT WORK. STILL NEED HELP. ANYONE?

Read full topic
item.source: Make it so a player can't kill the same player over? [EDIT: STILL NEED HELP!]

item.title: Make it so a player can't kill the same player over? [EDIT: STILL NEED HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

I’m not going to spoon feed you but.

final List<Player> killedPlayers = new ArrayList<Player>();

void playerKilled() {
    killedPlayers.add(player);
}

void attackPlayer() {
    if (killedPlayers.contains(player)) {
        return;
    }
}

Read full topic
item.source: Make it so a player can't kill the same player over? [EDIT: STILL NEED HELP!]

item.title: Make it so a player can't kill the same player over? [EDIT: STILL NEED HELP!]
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

AtomicInt_:

Add the last killed player to a List and check to see if the player is in the List whenever the player attacks another player, if he is, stop attacking.

Can you give me a reference on a tutorial on how to do that, and or the code?

Read full topic
